dialogue.introduction: Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, name's Kako! Nice to meetcha!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, Kako. I achieved quite a feat during the Battle of Savo Islands! Ah, the way back? Well, the verse "Going in is easy, but returning is scary" was no joke!
dialogue.secretary2: Strategy meeting? I'll just ask Furutaka about it later, can I not do that?
dialogue.secretary3: Yeah, yeah! I hear ya! Now stop pulling my skirt!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Zzzzzzz... Zzzzzz... Zzzzzzz... Zzzzzz... Zzzz... Nya... mfufufu. Whoa! I'm not sleeping! I was awake, I was.
dialogue.secretarymarried: What's up, Admiral. Why the red face? Hm? That's lack of sleep! Alright. I'll take a nap with you. I bet you'll have a wonderful dream!
dialogue.wedding: Aaaahhhh, another scolding, yeah? Sorry for my carelessness, yeah? Wha- that's not it? Admiralâ€¦ why is your face red?
dialogue.show_players_score: A letter for the Admiral... I'm awake, I'm awake!
dialogue.equipment1: Somehow, I feel cooler now, hehe
dialogue.equipment2: Woah, I'm wide awake now. I can feel the energy from this!
dialogue.supply: Torpedoes and ammunitions, Load them up well. Ah, don't forget the fuel too, okay?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Stop it...so sluggish...the fitting...ah, forget it...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Aah, I'm seriously gonna die...let me pass out in bed!
dialogue.ship_construction: Got a report that a new ship is do~ne.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The sortie's done, here's the report... *snore*
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Kako, ready to sortie! Furutaka, you're coming too.
dialogue.mvp: See, I can really do it if I try! So, when I get back, let me sleep a bunch!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Damn, and we were just about to leave!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: What?! A sub? Not good, not good!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Youuu! You perverted son of a bitch!
dialogue.sunk: Yeah, Furutaka always scolded me for getting carried away too much...
dialogue.end_of_year_2014: Uh, it's already the end of the year, that was quick. Can we do cleaning next year? Hey?
dialogue.new_year_2015: Happy New Year! Admiral, let's charge on this year too!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: To be able to spend such a day with admiral, I'm happy!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: It's finally starting to get hotter, isn't it? Summer's almost here, isn't it? Ehehe. Summer's great, aint it? It's great!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Great! Summer has come! Good, I'll have plenty of naps! ehh... Not good?
